dict.acceptation: 向前，向前方；露着的，往外的；[废语]出外，离家；

sent.orig: Back and forth go back and forth with strange treasure box, end exterminate two spiders.
sent.trans: 与奇怪的宝箱来回周旋，最终消灭两只蜘蛛。

sent.orig: Kratos: We must not stop! Go forth! Go forth and attack!
sent.trans: 克瑞托斯：“我们绝不能停下！前进！前进，进攻！”。

sent.orig: Then your light will break forth like the dawn, And your recovery will speedily spring forth.
sent.trans: 8这样，你的光就必突然发出如晨光，你所得的医治要速速发生。

sent.orig: The son went to his mother. He picked her and rocked andand forth and forth.
sent.trans: 一位妈妈抱住她新生的婴儿，缓缓的将他左右摇摆，左右摇摆，左右摇摆。

sent.orig: Flash forth lightning, and scatter them; Send forth Your arrows, and discomfit them.
sent.trans: 6求你发出闪电，使仇敌四散；射出你的箭，使他们溃乱。
